name: Chad Knight
description:
Enable fullscreen for a better experience!

THIS GAME IS A DEMO

You play as the Knight Chad. With the power to throw swords as hard as you can at the face of your enemies you must "rescue" your beloved princes from the evil knights

Controls:

ActionKeyMove[A] [D]Jump[Spacebar]AimMouseShoot SwordLeft Mouse ButtonRestart Game[R]
